posts.post_title: Ty Cobb T206 Green Portrait SGC 2
posts.post_content:
Absolutely stunning card with killer appeal to it. 

Need to net $4000 on this one. Only potential trades would be towards a ‘51 Bowman Mantle. 

Thanks!
